# ClinicoPathJamoviModule Test Data (.omv files) by Menu Group

**Total .omv Files:** 945

**Last Updated:** `r Sys.Date()`

**GitHub Repository:** [ClinicoPathJamoviModule](https://github.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule)

---

## How to Use This Guide

This document catalogs all 945 .omv (jamovi format) test data files available in the ClinicoPathJamoviModule. Each function section includes:

- **Purpose:** What the function does
- **When to use:** Clinical scenarios and research applications
- **Files:** List of available test data files with download links

### Downloading Test Data Files

All .omv files are available on GitHub. Click any filename to download:

- **Direct download:** Click the filename link
- **View in browser:** Files open in jamovi web viewer if available
- **Bulk download:** Clone the entire repository for all files

### Opening .omv Files in jamovi

1. Download the .omv file from the link
2. Open jamovi desktop application
3. File → Open → Select the downloaded .omv file
4. The data and any saved analyses will load automatically

### Understanding File Naming

- `{function}_test.omv` - Standard test dataset
- `{function}_{scenario}.omv` - Specific clinical scenario
- `{function}_small.omv` - Small sample for quick testing
- `{function}_large.omv` - Large sample for performance testing
- `{function}_edge_cases.omv` - Boundary conditions and special cases
- `{function}_comprehensive.omv` - Full feature demonstration

### Coverage Levels

- **Comprehensive (10+ files):** Very thorough testing, multiple scenarios
- **Good (5-9 files):** Well-tested with various scenarios
- **Basic (1-4 files):** Essential test coverage
- **Example/Demo:** Teaching and demonstration files

## ClinicoPathDescriptives

### agepyramid (1 file)
**Purpose:** Create population pyramids showing age distribution by gender
**When to use:** Patient demographic visualization, epidemiological studies, cohort characterization
**Files:**

- [agepyramid_test.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/agepyramid_test.omv)

### alluvial (1 file)
**Purpose:** Visualize flow and transitions between categorical states over time
**When to use:** Treatment pathways, disease progression, patient journey visualization
**Files:**

- [alluvial_test.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/alluvial_test.omv)

**Purpose:** Detect data fabrication using Benford's Law (first digit analysis)

## NEW: Kappa Sample Size Functions ✨

**Added:** January 2025
**Location:** meddecide menu group
**Total Files:** 9 (.omv files)
**Total Scenarios:** 258 (86 per function)

These three complementary functions provide comprehensive sample size planning for kappa agreement studies:

### kappasizeci (3 files) ✨ NEW
**Purpose:** Sample size for kappa agreement studies (confidence interval/precision approach)
**When to use:** Planning agreement studies, estimating kappa with desired precision, method validation design
**Approach:** "How many subjects needed to estimate kappa within ±X?"
**Files:**

- [kappasizeci_relationship_cases.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizeci_relationship_cases.omv)
- [kappasizeci_scenarios_comprehensive.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizeci_scenarios_comprehensive.omv)
- [kappasizeci_validation_cases.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizeci_validation_cases.omv)

### kappasizefixedn (3 files) ✨ NEW
**Purpose:** Reverse calculation - given fixed n, find lowest detectable kappa
**When to use:** Resource-constrained studies, completed trials, feasibility assessment, QA programs
**Approach:** "What can I detect with my fixed n?"
**Constraint types:** Budget, time, case availability, regulatory, protocol
**Files:**

- [kappasizefixedn_power_cases.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizefixedn_power_cases.omv)
- [kappasizefixedn_scenarios_comprehensive.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizefixedn_scenarios_comprehensive.omv)
- [kappasizefixedn_validation_cases.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizefixedn_validation_cases.omv)

### kappasizepower (3 files) ✨ NEW
**Purpose:** Sample size for kappa hypothesis testing (power-based approach)
**When to use:** Planning agreement studies with hypothesis tests, comparing kappa to threshold
**Approach:** "How many needed to test κ₁ vs. κ₀ with power X?"
**Files:**

- [kappasizepower_relationship_cases.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizepower_relationship_cases.omv)
- [kappasizepower_scenarios_comprehensive.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizepower_scenarios_comprehensive.omv)
- [kappasizepower_validation_cases.omv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbalci/ClinicoPathJamoviModule/master/data/kappasizepower_validation_cases.omv)

**Kappa Test Coverage:** 258 scenarios across all functions covering:

- 2-5 outcome categories
- 2-5 raters
- Binary, ordinal, and continuous outcomes
- Small to large sample sizes (n=10 to n=2000)
- Multiple constraint types and clinical domains
